mapper.select: select user_id, user_account, user_name, user_phone, user_img, user_sex, user_email, balance, integral, user_birthday, shop_id, (select count(1) from weiit_order oo where oo.user_id = u.user_id) as myOrderCount, (select count(1) from weiit_ump_coupon_user cu where cu.user_id = u.user_id) as myCouponCount from weiit_user u where u.user_account = #{user_account}

select user_id, user_account, user_name, user_phone, user_img, user_sex, user_email, balance, integral, user_birthday, shop_id, wx_open_id, open_id_type, (select count(1) from weiit_order oo where oo.user_id = u.user_id) as myOrderCount, (select count(1) from weiit_ump_coupon_user cu where cu.user_id = u.user_id) as myCouponCount from weiit_user u where u.wx_open_id = #{wx_open_id}
select title, content from weiit_blog where id = #{blogId}

SELECT t2.wx_template_id FROM weiit_weixin_public_template_msg t2, weiit_weixin_public_info t3 WHERE t3.authorizer_app_id = #{authorizer_app_id} AND t2.authorizer_id = t3.authorizer_id AND t2.state = 1 AND t2.business_type = #{business_type} limit 1
SELECT shop_domain_prex, shop_tel, shop_logo FROM weiit_shop WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id}
select region_name, id from weiit_init_region where parent_id = #{parent_id}
mapper.insert: insert into weiit_user (user_account, user_name, user_nike, user_phone, user_img, user_sex, region, balance, integral, user_birthday, wx_union_id, wx_open_id, parent_id, create_time, update_time, open_id_type, shop_id) values (#{user_account}, #{user_name}, #{user_nike}, #{user_phone}, #{user_img}, #{user_sex}, #{region}, #{balance}, #{integral}, #{user_birthday}, #{wx_union_id}, #{wx_open_id}, #{parent_id}, now(), now(), #{open_id_type}, #{shop_id})
insert into test_express_url (id, express_code, express_name, express_url) values (#{id}, #{express_code}, #{express_name}, #{express_url})
mapper.select: select * from weiit_weixin_mini_intropage where shop_id = #{shop_id} AND is_use = 1 limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weiit_weixin_mini_intropage (intro_page_url, intro_page_desc, create_time, is_use, shop_id) VALUES (#{intro_page_url}, #{intro_page_desc}, now(), #{is_use}, #{shop_id})
mapper.select: SELECT ww.partner_id, ww.partner_key, wu.user_id, wu.shop_id FROM weiit_user wu, weiit_shop_payment ww WHERE wu.wx_open_id = #{wx_open_id} AND wu.open_id_type = ww.type AND wu.shop_id = ww.shop_id

SELECT wu.user_id, wu.user_name, wu.wx_open_id, wu.open_id_type, pi.authorizer_app_id, wu.shop_id FROM weiit_user wu LEFT JOIN weiit_weixin_public_info pi ON wu.shop_id = pi.shop_id WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND pi.service_type_info = (IF(wu.open_id_type = 1, 2, 0))
